languages.text: "Этого все еще недостаточно для полноценного обвинения, однако доктрина Арбитес требует бдительности. Предлагаю выяснить, это дезинформация, которой лидеры бунта кормят своих пешек, или достоверное свидетельство".

"This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."
languages.original_text: "Этого все еще недостаточно для полноценного обвинения, однако доктрина Арбитес требует бдительности. Предлагаю выяснить, это дезинформация, которой лидеры бунта кормят своих пешек, или достоверное свидетельство".

traits.locale_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion feed to their underlings or genuine testimony."

"This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

languages.text: “这些证据还不足以提出正式指控，但法务部会对一切情况保持警惕。我建议我们再次核实一下，看看这些话究竟是叛军领袖向属下提供的虚假信息，还是真实的供词。”
languages.original_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

traits.locale_text: “这些证据还不足以提出正式指控，但法务部会对一切情况保持警惕。我建议我们再次核实一下，看看这些话究竟是叛军领袖向属下提供的虚假信息，还是真实的供词。”

languages.text: «Esto no es prueba suficiente para una acusación formal, pero la doctrina del Arbites ensalza la vigilancia. Propongo que verifiquemos si se trata de desinformación por parte de los líderes de la rebelión o un testimonio genuino».
languages.original_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

traits.locale_text: «Esto no es prueba suficiente para una acusación formal, pero la doctrina del Arbites ensalza la vigilancia. Propongo que verifiquemos si se trata de desinformación por parte de los líderes de la rebelión o un testimonio genuino».

languages.text: « Cela ne suffit pas pour porter une accusation en bonne et due forme, mais la doctrine de l'Arbites encourage à la vigilance. Je propose de prendre le temps de vérifier s'il s'agit de la vérité ou bien de désinformation dont les têtes pensantes de la rébellion abreuvent leurs subalternes. »
languages.original_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

traits.locale_text: « Cela ne suffit pas pour porter une accusation en bonne et due forme, mais la doctrine de l'Arbites encourage à la vigilance. Je propose de prendre le temps de vérifier s'il s'agit de la vérité ou bien de désinformation dont les têtes pensantes de la rébellion abreuvent leurs subalternes. »

languages.text: 「これは正式な告発には十分な証拠ではありませんが、高等裁定局の方針では警戒を美徳としています。これは反乱の指導者たちが部下に与えている偽情報なのか、それとも真実の証言なのかを確認すべきだと思います」
languages.original_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

traits.locale_text: 「これは正式な告発には十分な証拠ではありませんが、高等裁定局の方針では警戒を美徳としています。これは反乱の指導者たちが部下に与えている偽情報なのか、それとも真実の証言なのかを確認すべきだと思います」

languages.text: "Bu, doğru dürüst bir suçlama yapmak için yeterli bir kanıt değil. Fakat Arbites öğretisi, teyakkuzu yüceltir. Bu bilginin, isyan önderlerinin astlarına verdikleri yanlış bilgiler mi yoksa gerçek bir ifade mi olduğunu doğrulamayı öneriyorum."
languages.original_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

traits.locale_text: "Bu, doğru dürüst bir suçlama yapmak için yeterli bir kanıt değil. Fakat Arbites öğretisi, teyakkuzu yüceltir. Bu bilginin, isyan önderlerinin astlarına verdikleri yanlış bilgiler mi yoksa gerçek bir ifade mi olduğunu doğrulamayı öneriyorum."

languages.text: "Das ist kein ausreichender Beweis für eine ordnungsgemäße Anklage, aber die Arbites-Doktrin schätzt Wachsamkeit. Ich schlage vor, wir verifizieren, ob es sich hier um falsche Informationen der Anführer der Rebellion für ihre Anhänger handelt oder um eine echte Aussage."
languages.original_text: "This is not sufficient evidence for a proper accusation, but the Arbites doctrine extols vigilance. I propose we verify whether this is disinformation that the leaders of the rebellion are feeding to their underlings, or genuine testimony."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist kein ausreichender Beweis für eine ordnungsgemäße Anklage, aber die Arbites-Doktrin schätzt Wachsamkeit. Ich schlage vor, wir verifizieren, ob es sich hier um falsche Informationen der Anführer der Rebellion für ihre Anhänger handelt oder um eine echte Aussage."
